885190.name: Mahjong Pretty Manga Girls
885190.description:
Play smartly to unlock the most pretty girls in the game MAHJONG PRETTY MANGA GIRLS.
The game is super simple, you just need to link similar mahjong tiles. Your goal is to find all matching pairs to finish the level and unlock new girls. The game is getting harder and harder but you'll love it for sure !

Can you get all the girls ?

If you are a fan of manga (japanese cartoon characters), you'll love this game !
885190.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语, 日语, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 泰语, 土耳其语
